name: Type: Bug
description: Something isn't working

name: Type: Maintenance
description: Something needs updating, e.g: Documentation

name: Type: Enhancement
description: Something new to make this better

name: Type: Question
description: I don't understand something

name: Status: Won't Fix
description: We are not going to fix this

name: Status: Abandoned
description: It has been abandoned by whoever was working on it

name: Status: Accepted
description: Someone has agreeded to work on this

name: Status: Available
description: No one is working on this yet

name: Status: Blocked
description: We will working on it but something is stopping us

name: Status: Completed
description: It's done!

name: Status: In Progress
description: We are currently working on this now

name: Status: On Hold
description: We were working on it, and will continue, but need to do something else instead

name: Status: Pending
description: Now to wait...

name: Status: Review Needed
description: We need to look at this and make a decision

name: Status: Revision Needed
description: Need to revise what this is about

name: Status: Stale
description: This issue is stale

name: Priority: Low
description: We are aware, but need to do other things first

name: Priority: Medium
description: This is important, and will get attention soon

name: Priority: High
description: This is very important, should be tackled very soon

name: Priority: Critical
description: This must be fixed now, nothing else should be done until this is done

name: Good First Issue
description: This is something a new contributor could tackle

name: Help Wanted
description: Feel free to jump in and help!

name: Never Stale
description: These issues will never be marked stale
